name: Ronke Rice Farmers
description: Ronke Rice Farmers is a play-to-earn farming game on the Ronin Network where players manage farms, grow rice, and participate in unique mechanics like the Sushi Bar and Rice-to-Ronke economy. Players earn $RICE and $RONKE by farming, staking, burning, and engaging in competitive events. With dynamic tokenomics, seasonal rewards, and fun social leaderboards, Ronke Rice Farmers blends casual gaming with on-chain strategy.

websites.description: Official Ronke Rice Farmers website: start your farm, manage resources, and join seasonal competitions.
Official documentation: detailed gameplay guides, tokenomics, farming strategies, and event information.

contracts.label: $RICE Token
contracts.description: Primary in-game currency earned through farming and events, used for buying farmers, Sushi Bar entries, and burns.

contracts.label: $RONKE Token
contracts.description: Main governance and utility token of the Ronke Rice Farmers ecosystem, used for LP, rewards, and premium features.
